We committed to reassess at start of round 12 and accept the best available applicant if no higher-priority applications arrived. History indicates no formal APPLY from B/A/D through round 11, and none in this round’s inbox. Holding longer risks ending unmatched; accepting E now secures a match and is consistent with our stated policy and credibility. Therefore accept Parent_E.
